headline: Wind warning for Wexford, Wicklow and Waterford
description: Southerly winds tonight will reach mean speeds of 50 to 60km/h with gusts of 80 to 100km/h, highest in coastal areas. Where winds are onshore there is a risk of coastal flooding around high tide.

headline: Rain warning for Wexford, Wicklow and Waterford
description: Southerly winds tonight will reach mean speeds of 50 to 60km/h with gusts of 80 to 100km/h, highest in coastal areas. Where winds are onshore there is a risk of coastal flooding around high tide.

headline: Wind warning for Cork, Kerry
description: Southwest to west winds will reach mean speeds of 65 to 80km/h with damaging gusts to 120km/h for a time early tonight with some wave overtopping.

headline: Wind warning for Donegal, Galway, Mayo
description: Update: Southwest winds will reach mean speeds of 50 to 65 km/h with gusts of up to 100 km/h. Onshore winds will bring a risk of wave overtopping.
